about_the_game:
1.Majapahit's campaign and tutorial
Before explore Indonesia archipelago and start the conquest, understand first the tutorial by playing
Majapahit's campaign as only faction ca be playable
2.Only one year
In this demo, only 1 year length time in this game you can play unlike in main game with 100 years. But you can conquer all regions in Indonesia archipelago with Majapahit. After 1 year, you will back to return menu.

You play Majapahit, strong faction with lot of war junks and early gunpowder faction. Also support of large cities in north coast Java can help you to understand game more faster and starting your conquest!

name: Perang Laut - Maritime Warfare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Duel CPU E2140 1.60 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: Perang Laut-Maritime Warfare Demo is historical real time strategy and in this demo, only Majapahit's tutorial campaign can play in this game and the lenght of time only 1 year.
